org.jhotdraw.contrib.zoom
Class MiniMapZoomableView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              org.jhotdraw.contrib.MiniMapView
                  org.jhotdraw.contrib.zoom.MiniMapZoomableView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class MiniMapZoomableView
extends MiniMapView

Specialized sub-class of MiniMapView to handle the zooming ability of the ZoomDrawingView in JHotDraw. This subclass has been enhanced to take into consideration that the scrollpane's content may itself be altered by a transform (namely a scaling transform).

Version:
<$CURRENT_VERSION$>
See Also:
Serialized Form
